title: Mac won't launch
body: On Mac, the patcher opens normally but when I click launch, it crashes. I have tried a lot of things to fix this and I am very frustrated. ;-;

replies.body: If that client is crashing and showing you some type of error message, it sounds like some of the game files might have gotten damaged somehow and now it's not able to run normally. Check out the steps in our [**crash guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974) and make sure to pay attention to the Mac version of those steps. Test those changes in a custom or practice game and let me know how it helps!
I may have phrased that wrong, but the client isn't loading. At all.

No worries! It sounds like you're having the same issue some of our other Mac players have been having. I'm not 100% sure what might be causing this, but some people have been able to get around it by manually updating their OS. Check out [**this link**](https://itunes.apple.com/us/app/macos-sierra/id1127487414?mt=12&ls=1) and try giving that update a shot. Please hit me back up and let me know if this helps or not!

Older Mac sadly....
Can't get that OS

I had that happening a few patches ago as well. Solved it by going into the "activity monitor" and closing a remnant of the last time I ran league. Just scroll down the processes and it should be there. I suspect you can fix it by simply restarting as well but never tried it since this is faster.
I have having the same problem. I click launch and no login screen. I have tried reinstalling and patching many times, but no solution. I have mac aswell
Try downloading latest software update on your mac if nothing else works, it worked for me after i updated.

I've been having the same problem. I can open the launch screen however, when i press launch, the launch screen disappears but the login screen doesn't come up. I think this started for me when i tried to update to the last patch.
